entities.name: ministry
entities.description: The Ministry is mentioned as a governing body that has foisted an useless teacher upon the students. The Ministry is also mentioned as being in denial about the return of You-Know-Who.

entities.name: umbridge
entities.description: Umbridge is introduced as a teacher who is trying to actively prevent the students from using defensive spells. She has some mad idea that Dumbledore could use the students as a private army.

entities.name: dumbledore
entities.description: Dumbledore is mentioned by Umbridge as someone who might mobilize the students against the Ministry.

entities.name: you-know-who
entities.description: You-Know-Who is mentioned as a dark force that the Ministry is in denial about. The return of You-Know-Who is also mentioned as a reason for Umbridge's actions.

entities.name: hermione
entities.description: Hermione is introduced as someone who shares her thoughts on why Umbridge doesn't want the students to be trained in Defense Against the Dark Arts.

relationships.description: Umbridge is trying to prevent the students from using defensive spells, which suggests that she opposes the Ministry's goals.
Hermione thinks that Umbridge believes Dumbledore might mobilize the students against the Ministry, suggesting a potential alliance between Dumbledore and the students.
